pr_title: Fix timestamp extract fn to match postgreSQL

timeline.message:
Fix timestamp extract fn to match postgres

Update the timestamp extract function so that it matches the PostgreSQL docs.
Examples from the PostgreSQL docs were added as tests for DECADE, CENTURY
and MILLENIUM extraction.

There were bugs in CENTURY and MILLENIUM that were spotted because of intelliJ
inspections - 'Integer division in floating point context'

timeline.bodyText: I thought about making this an error in our inspection profile, but CachingCostBalancerStrategy does this, and I'm afraid to make a change in that class given the potential implications around the balancer strategy. I'm un-aware of a way to simulate what impact changing that division would have, so I decided to leave it as is.
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: Could it be suppressed in that one location?
replies.author: gianm

timeline.bodyText: These values come from BaseCalciteQueryTest#TIMESERIES_CONTEXT_DEFAULT which is 2000-01-01T00:00:00Z
timeline.author: suneet-s
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7730,7 +7730,7 @@ public void testFilterOnTimeExtractWithVariousTimeUnits() throws Exception
           + "AND EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM __time) = 6\n"
           + "AND EXTRACT(ISOYEAR FROM __time) = 2000\n"
           + "AND EXTRACT(DECADE FROM __time) = 200\n"
-          + "AND EXTRACT(CENTURY FROM __time) = 21\n"
+          + "AND EXTRACT(CENTURY FROM __time) = 20\n"
           + "AND EXTRACT(MILLENNIUM FROM __time) = 2\n",

timeline.bodyText: You don't need Math.round if the result is already Math.ceil since Math.ceil returns int
timeline.author: maytasm
maytasm

replies.bodyText:
someone collected statistics for computers back in 101 BC 😂
I'll add tests for correctness though 👍
replies.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText:
I decided it might be better not to support BC.
Since in ISO format, the date needs to be specified like -0100-12-31 to signify the year 0101-12-31 BC This would make the code complicated for a use case that is likely never to happen 🤞
replies.author: suneet-s

timeline.message: mark integer division as an error
